snippet.title: MICROIDS - DRACULA THE LAST SANCTUARY (OFFICIAL TRAILER) IPHONE IPAD MAC APP ADVENTURE GAMING
snippet.description:
Join us on Facebook (http://bit.ly/bioA5b) and on Twitter (http://bit.ly/apnV9H) 

The hunt for Dracula continues in this blood-curdling 360° adventure !

Jonathan Harker returns in triumph from Transylvania after he saves Mina. But he can't rest for long--Dracula has followed him up to London.
He's now determined to hunt down the Count wherever he goes, so he can finish him off once and for all.

Watch the official trailer here.

Dracula : The Last Sanctuary is now available on Mac, iPhone and iPad : http://bit.ly/zcji5O

Follow us on :

Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/microids
Twitter : http://www.twitter.com/microids_off
